1.content:
You are a hollow, a human spirit who has lost part of their soul to despair. You, who were once a human like anyone, have now become a monster. You live only to devour. Like some hollows, you might possess the near entirety of your former human intelligence, or you might be just barely above a mindless beast.

Either way, your instincts are everything, and your instincts tell you to hunt. But first, you must know thyself. What gender are you? (Yes, hollows really have genders.)

You are shaped like a grotesque mockery of humanity, with an incredibly hard enamel white mask covering your face. Your jaws are exceptionally strong, for a hollow of your level, with big, sharp teeth ideal for tearing into your prey.

You are a classical predator. You don't need any fancy powers or unusual abilities to catch and eat your victim; all you need is to snatch them up and take a bite. You are, ultimately, uncomplicated, though not necessarily unintelligent.

You do not care about any of that fluff, though. No, you are hungry.

You are always hungry.

But you are also weak, being very low in the food circle of Hueco Mundo, the world of the hollows. So you make frequent forays into the world of the living, where you can find weaker, delicious humans (in particular, you are quite fond of females, finding them nice and tender, though you are not picky and will eat anything you think you can get away with taking a bite out of). They scarcely make a dent in your hunger, of course, but then as a hollow there is nothing in any world that can truly sate your appetite, only take the edge off of it.

Still, you do not care about the details. All that matters to you is the Hunger, and the metaphorical scent of Prey.

So you reach out with your senses, feeling out for entities of significant spiritual power (though not too significant -- you have heard the horror stories of the things that have happened to those greenhorn hollows hungry or foolhardy enough to attempt taking on shinigami. But her body's not what you came for.

Pulling your arm back, you see her spirit rise from the spattered gore that was her body, a short chain hanging from her chest.

She stares uncomprehendingly at what had only seconds ago been her. The suddenness of her death has left her stunned, making her even easier prey for you.

You snatch her up in one hand, feeling the resistance her spiritual form offers as you squeeze it -- she definitely has a considerable amount of spiritual power: compared to how her physical body flew apart the second you touched, her soul is exponentially sturdier.

11421222.content:
As quickly as the notion enters your head, you discard it. While hollows such as yourself certainly possessed the same... equipment, more or less, as humans and shinigami, lust rarely won out over hunger. And a hollow of your lowly level could scarcely afford to squander such a meal on sexual gratification.

So you simply bite off the offending parts of your prey, as well as much of her abdomen. You do not chew, but simply swallow flesh and blood and bone and cloth all down your gullet, greedily gulping down your food. Once more, it digests almost immediately, but this time you can feel your spiritual power noticeably increasing, if only by a minor factor, as her reiryoku is incorporated into your own.

You lick some blood from your mask before taking another bite out of your prey, shifting what remains of her tiny body in your hand to give your jaws access. This time you take away most of her torso and her arms, which had been held at her sides in your crushing grip. There's not much of her left now, though you can still feel a faint pulse of life. Even with scarcely more than her head and shoulders left, the spirit still stubbornly clings to existence, fading only slowly.

You are impressed at how durable she is proving. She was a worthy meal, the kind that weaker hollows like you would die to get a hold of: vulnerable and nutritious, packed with spiritual power she didn't know how to use. The more of her that you devoured, the more you felt your reiatsu roil and surge and grow and change.

With a satisfied grin, you shove the rest of her into your maw, messily crunching her skull between molars like tombstones. Your hunger was actually abating, just a little, and you could feel your body metamorphosing. You felt a little bit bolder, feeling more strength in your limbs and seeing spiritual enamel take shape into thin, spiked plates on your forearms. This is a rare reprieve from the all-consuming hunger, and you know that soon enough you will be driven to hunt once more, but you feel a little more confident now in your ability to survive.

How long was it before the hunger called on you again?

141.content:
When Urahara felt the sudden blast of hollow reiatsu come from the Shattered Shaft, he almost lost his composure. It was on a level of intensity he had only felt once or twice over the entirety of his career. The force of it was like a solid, ten ton wall that bore down upon him and Tessai at speeds in excess of mach four, and it was all he could do just to keep from falling to his knees as the figure rose from the hole.

It was a hollow, there was no mistaking that. But it was a hollow on a level that the scientist never could have anticipated. Long, orange hair, horns like a steer, a thick muscled hide painted white and red. In its hand was a black, single-edged sword with a manji hilt, and gleaming yellow eyes peered out at them from beneath the enamel mask.

It was tall and muscular and awesomely powerful, its spiritual pressure alone nearly enough to bring the roof of this massive subterranean clearing down on their heads.

Kisuke was actually trembling as he stared down this beast, and it was all he could do to resist the urge to go immediately bankai and exterminate this hollow with his full strength. But he did resist, partly because he felt he owed it, on some level, to the boy whose life he had irreversibly complicated almost straight from day one, and partly also because he wasn't even sure if he would actually be able to take this hollowfied Ichigo by himself.

Even with the kind of kido that Tessai could bring to bear, Urahara's old friend and assistant would be little use against an enemy of this level. Even Urahara himself would not feel comfortable tackling something like this without at least two upper-tier captain class fighters to back him up.

But he didn't really have a choice in this matter. Desperate times called for desperate measures...

What did he do?
141.title: Ichigo as a Vasto Lorde

choices: Giving old Hat-and-Clogs some surprise buttsex
Slipping past them to get out into Karakura town
1413.content:
Urahara sighed. He knew right away what he would need to do. Ichigo had somehow not only hollowfied, but also prematurely evolved all the way to the highest level of menos. His power was immense, now, but it was also unstable.

Ichigo simply didn't have enough spiritual power to act as a foundation for his new form. At the moment, it was being sustained by the sheer force of the teen's reiryoku, but that could only hold out for so long. Urahara was certain that the boy was still in there, but his body was too unstable for his consciousness to manifest properly.

He needed sustenance, a hearty meal to stabilize his soul and augment his native strength. And there was only one thing present with enough spiritual nutritional value to do this.

Ichigo needed to eat something with a reiatsu at or above captain level, and Urarahara knew that he would either have to bite the bullet himself, or kill Ichigo here and now.

And the latter wasn't an option.

"Heh, somehow I always knew I'd go out this way..." remarked the exiled mad scientist as he let his zanpakuto drop to the ground and took a step forward, discarding his hat and coat.

"Manager...!" gasped Tessai, frowning as he watched his friend walk towards the berserk, hollowfied Ichigo while shedding his clothes article by article. "What are you...?!"

"I'm making my biggest gamble yet," replied Urahara with an almost casual tone even just as he removed the last of his clothes, leaving himself stark naked and effectively defenseless. "C'mere, Ichi-boy~!" he then said brightly to the hollowfied teen. "Have a bite of old Urahara! I'm chock full of essential vitamins and minerals, as well as your daily dose of anti-implodium~!"

Ichigo let out a bellowing roar, throwing his head back as he howled and his reiatsu spiked. The ground beneath their feet started to shake from the sheer force of his spiritual pressure. Then he lowered his head again, fixing his gaze squarely on the naked Urahara.

He pounced. But what was he doing?

choices: Flash forward to when they head to Soul Society
14131.content:

For a moment, he felt himself getting hard, getting perversely erect from the manhandling of his privates, but it did not last. He felt the warm moistness of blood running freely from his newly de-boned crotch, staining his thighs a bloody scarlet.

Blinking stars out of his vision, Kisuke kept himself standing. He saw Ichigo tear into his dismembered dick like a dog devouring a bratwurst. Blood was everywhere, and Ichigo quickly swallowed the ragged hunk of meat.

The horned head reared back, letting out an undeniable hollow howl, long orange hair swinging wildly as Ichigo then swung his jaws down and forward. Urahara hissed, feeling a new pain in his shoulder, and he heard the sound of more tearing flesh as Ichigo zealously downed bite after bite of the scientist's flesh.

Bones cracked, and Ichigo tore off the arm from the side he had bitten down on, ravenously devouring the limb like a miniature chicken drumstick. Except he ate the bones as well, crunching them up with powerful teeth and swallowing them down his insatiable gullet. Then he did the same to Urahara's other arm.

Kisuke was getting woozy by now, as Ichigo began feasting on his thighs. He was on his back, by now, no longer able to stand. He was weak from blood loss, and unable to fight back even if he had wanted to.

Now Urahara's legs were torn off, and they went the same way as his arms. He was pretty much just a head and most of a torso by now, and he was losing consciousness fast.

But Ichigo seemed to be eating less bestially, now. He was still devouring Urahara, yes, but it was not with the mindless rapacity of a hollow. He was keeping Urahara alive as long as possible, forestalling the shinigami's by now almost inevitable disintegration as he glutted himself on manflesh. And his eyes were not the empty voids of a hollow, but the intelligent brown of Ichigo Kurosaki.

"Thanks for the grub, Hat-and-clogs," said Ichigo wryly, seeing Urahara's eyes looking into his. The exiled captain laughed weakly.

"Eat up," he told Ichigo. "Or didn't your parents ever teach you not to leave food on your plate?"

The hollow mouth curled into a smile, before the teeth parted and swung down once more. Ichigo tore into Urahara's abdomen, and eating with a speed that frightened and astounded, he devoured every last lingering part of the scientist's body.

He had the mind of Ichigo Kurosaki once more. But his body was still the body of a vasto lorde.

What next?

info.brief_description: Become a hollow. Prey on pluses, soul reapers, or even other hollows! Eat or be eaten!
info.description:
Okay. SO. There have been all sorts of Bleach stories, all sorts of Bleach interactives. But none like this probably.

Become a hollow. Prey on the souls of the living and dead to grow stronger. Be as brutal or as "gentle" as you want; if you fancy playing with your prey, then by all means play with them. Devour nameless civilians, minor characters, maybe even members of the main cast if you get enough up the food chain.

But be careful. Life Death Existence is not easy for hollows. There are countless dangers, from shinigami to empowered humans, even your fellow hollows with devour you given half the chance. Play it safe, life long, evolve to the highest levels of power...

...or live hard and die young.

Either way, have fun~!

Guidlines:

Basically any kind of vore is allowed -- hollows are as varied in their forms and abilities as anything, who knows what sorts of powers some might have? ;)

Also, please, if you're going to add a chapter, make sure it's readable. Try to capitalize correctly and use intelligible grammar. Also do your best to spell correctly -- typos are understandable, but consistent misspelling of simple words is annoying for many people, and I want this to be something we can all enjoy.

Other than that, there's only one other rule: No scat. Watersports are okay, if you can justify it on some level. But scat is just gross (no offense to any scat-lovers reading this).
